Hey ! I’m a 20 year old web developer based in Valence - France.

I'm currently in my third year of the professional degree CASIR working as an apprentice at Batiactu Groupe. I’m using Magento in my work essentially but I've used Django, Ruby On Rails, Symfony and a lot more in my personal / school projects. I'm also learning Laravel, OctoberCMS and some front-end stuff like VueJs, Sass, Webpack...
